summary: Fitness-focused event coordinator with experience managing large-scale running events, volunteer teams, sponsorships, and community outreach. Highly organized and a strong problem solver with excellent communication, leadership, and time management skills under changing conditions.

experience.title: Adventure Run Coordinator
experience.description: Coordinate two Arizona Adventure Run events; manage event permitting, charity beer garden, sponsorships and vendors; oversee setup/teardown; host events for approximately 500 attendees; supervise up to 25 volunteers and communicate with staff; promote events within the running and fitness community and handle unexpected obstacles with calm, high energy.

experience.title: Grassroots Marketing Representative
experience.description: Community outreach for Arizona stores; book group runs and clinics, coordinate local race packet pickups, engage gyms and vendors for partnerships; manage own schedule and store event calendars and budgets.

experience.title: Cash Wrap
experience.description: Assist customers with product recommendations, answer questions, and handle checkout; multitask handling phone inquiries and in-store interactions.

experience.title: Operations
experience.description: Greet and check-in gym members; answer calls, assist with concerns, schedule appointments, manage memberships; multitask with leadership and a customer-first mindset; promote healthy lifestyle at the workplace.

experience.title: Front Desk Fitness Attendant
experience.description: Summer Kid's Camp advisor; organize daily activities, oversee lunch and swim sessions; support team events; perform front desk duties, promotions, staff coordination, and customer service; assist with sales, snack bar, and facility upkeep.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Psychology and Sociology
